text:
I'm using Apache 2.2.9-dev on Linux (Fedora 8), i386.
Default AcceptMutex is sysvsem.
[Fri May 23 16:45:50 2008] [debug] prefork.c(991): AcceptMutex: sysvsem (default : sysvsem)

But misc/perf-tuning.xml says:

> AcceptMutex sysvsem 
(snip)
> For these reasons this method is not used on any architecture except IRIX (where the
> previous two are prohibitively expensive on most IRIX boxes).
creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st

text:
> Warning
> This section has not been fully updated 

just several lines above.
So this is not valid bug report.

Sorry for noise
creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
